uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.tests

Class TillTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.tests.TillTest

  • public class TillTest
extends java.lang.Object
    JUnit test case class for methods and operations in Till class.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11)

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
        Performs generic operations that are required before every test case method.

      • testCreateNewOrderWithName

        public void testCreateNewOrderWithName()

      • testCreateNewOrderWithoutName

        public void testCreateNewOrderWithoutName()
        Test case method for createNewOrder() method in Till class. Tests that method can initialise the 'newOrder' object without a specified customer name.

      • testAddOrder

        public void testAddOrder()
        Test case method for addOrder() method in Till class. Tests that the method can successfully add a test Order object to the array list of Orders stored with Till.

      • testGetTotalForDay

        public void testGetTotalForDay()
        Test case method for getTotalForDay() method in Till class. Tests that the method can successfully calculate and return the sum of the sub totals of all the stored Order objects inside the Till object.

      • testSave

        public void testSave()
        Test case method for save() method in Till class. Tests that the method can successfully export the Till object to XML before saving the file.

      • testLoad

        public void testLoad()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Test case method for load() method in Till class. Tests that the method can successfully create a new Till object from XML, or if this is not possible, creates a new Till object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • testGetOrderArray

        public void testGetOrderArray()
        Test case method for getOrderArray() method in Till class. Tests that the method can successfully return the array list of Order objects stored in the Till object.

      • testPrintReceipt

        public void testPrintReceipt()
        Test case method for printReceipt() method in Till class. Tests that the method can successfully generate and export bespoke order receipts and before saving them as individual HTML files.

      • testGenerateReport

        public void testGenerateReport()
        Test case method for generateReport() method in Till class. Tests that the method can successfully generate and export a bespoke 'end of day' till report using data obtained from the Till class.
